Name: PickupSelection
Text: Whoah! They have dropped something. Let's pick one!

Name: RemoveItemSelection
Text: My chance to get rid of one of these items!

Name: SkipAndHeal
Text: Do you want to skip and heal {0}% percent of HP ({1})?

Name: Popup_AddItem
Text: Do you want to add this item into you?

Name: Popup_RemoveItem
Text: Do you want to remove this item from you?

Name: LuggageUpgradeSelect
Text: Time to pepare myself for the next battles!

Name: Tutorial_start
Text: Nooo! You are left at the airport and you need to find your way home! Gladly you have something in you, use them to clear your way home!

Name: Tutorial_attack
Text: Attack would push all items in you to the direction you are moving. If the item will hit the border, it would attack. Number on items shows how much you can damage the enemy.

Name: Tutorial_breakable
Text: There are kinds of item that would be broken and take effect rather than hit the border. Try them out!

Name: MoveItemHint
Text: Drag Item To Move it (Cost 1 Action Point)

Name: Gameover
Text: You died! But don't worry, some of your collections and your upgrades will keep for the next run!

Name: WinGame
Text: You win! Thanks for playing! You can keep playing the game if you want!
